system.descriptor: Following signs left by a target, determining time passed since tracks were made, numbers in a group of targets, and their race. Test only needed if environment or target concealment attempts affect the user's ability to track.
system.uses:
Skill Test: Test to track path target took, and gain information on them. Made as part of movement, if test is harder than +0, halves movement rat.e
Opposed Skill Test vs Concealment: Track target despite their attempts to conceal their movement.
